member.summary: OOBCertHash ::= SEQUENCE { hashAlg [0] AlgorithmIdentifier OPTIONAL, certId [1] CertId OPTIONAL, hashVal BIT STRING -- hashVal is calculated over the DER encoding of the -- self-signed certificate with the identifier certID. }

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15
member.summary:
Shall encode PKCS 15 DDO ASN1 object:
DDO ::= SEQUENCE { oid OBJECT IDENTIFIER, odfPath Path OPTIONAL, tokenInfoPath[0] Path OPTIONAL, unusedPath[1] Path OPTIONAL, ... -- For future extensions }

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15.#ctor(smartcardLib.Card.ICardController)
member.summary: Constructor that should use a card controller

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15.readApplicationDirectory
member.summary: Read Application directory [DIR] if DIR application contains more than on AID information then this call will return Directory of AID and Application Templates
member.returns: Directory of AID and Application Templates

member.summary: Read a card object at a specific location
member.param: path under the directory file if the path is absolute then df can be null

member.summary: Read multiple file objects (TLV objects after each other)

member.returns: List of the data objects in the file

member.returns: List of all ASN1 objects found

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15.readObjectListForApplication(smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15ApplicationTemplate)
member.summary: Read Object object in an Application template Make sure that the DDO is filled since it is Optional and not all card implmentation fills that field you should fill it manually if this is the case
member.remarks: The output of this call is on the logger [Default Logger]

member.name: P:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15.aidlist
member.summary: AID list read from the DIR EF

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15AccessControlRule
T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15ApplicationTemplate
member.summary: application template Data element, which may be present for example in a DIR file, and which contains one or more DOs relevant to an application. its an optional object that shall include PKCS15 DIRRecord and DDO object as follow DIRRecord ::= [APPLICATION 1] SEQUENCE { aid[APPLICATION 15] OCTET STRING, label[APPLICATION 16] UTF8String OPTIONAL, path[APPLICATION 17] OCTET STRING, ddo[APPLICATION 19] DDO OPTIONAL } DDO ::= SEQUENCE { oid OBJECT IDENTIFIER, odfPath Path OPTIONAL, tokenInfoPath[0] Path OPTIONAL, unusedPath[1] Path OPTIONAL, ... -- For future extensions }

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15ApplicationTemplate.#ctor(smartcardLib.Core.ASN1)
member.param: ASN1 object that contains the PKCS15 application template

member.name: P:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15ApplicationTemplate.aid
member.summary: The application identifier for this application.

member.name: P:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15ApplicationTemplate.ddo
member.summary: The PKCS#15 Directory Data Object (DDO) for this application.

member.name: P:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15ApplicationTemplate.label
member.summary: The application label for this application

member.name: P:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15ApplicationTemplate.objlist
member.summary: The list of Cryptographic Information Objects (CIO).

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15AuthenticationObject
member.remarks: Only support for password authentication object

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15Certificate
member.summary: X509CertificateAttributes ::= SEQUENCE { value ObjectValue { Certificate }, subject Name OPTIONAL, issuer[0] Name OPTIONAL, serialNumber CertificateSerialNumber OPTIONAL, ... -- For future extensions }

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15Certificate.#ctor(smartcardLib.Core.ASN1)
member.summary: Can only read X509 Certificate currently

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CIAInfo
member.summary: The class decodes the following ASN.1 syntax CIAInfo ::= SEQUENCE { version INTEGER { v1(0),v2(1)} (v1|v2,...), serialNumber OCTET STRING OPTIONAL, manufacturerID Label OPTIONAL, label[0] Label OPTIONAL, cardflags CardFlags, seInfo SEQUENCE OF SecurityEnvironmentInfo OPTIONAL, recordInfo[1] RecordInfo OPTIONAL, supportedAlgorithms[2] SEQUENCE OF AlgorithmInfo OPTIONAL, issuerId[3] Label OPTIONAL, holderId[4] Label OPTIONAL, lastUpdate[5] LastUpdate OPTIONAL, preferredLanguage PrintableString OPTIONAL, -- In accordance with IETF RFC 1766 profileIndication[6] SEQUENCE OF ProfileIndication OPTIONAL, ... } (CONSTRAINED BY { -- Each AlgorithmInfo.reference value shall be unique --})

member.name: F:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CIAInfo.PRNG_GENERATION
member.summary: Random number generation capable card flag

member.summary: ASN1 object of the CIA Info

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CIAInfo.#ctor(smartcardLib.Core.ASN1)
member.param: ASN1 object containing the PKCS15 CIA

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CIAInfo.getCardflagsAsString
member.summary: Get card flag as readable string

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CIAInfo.ToString
member.returns: a readable string of the PKCS15 CIA

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CommonObjectAttributes
member.summary: The class decodes the following ASN.1 syntax: CommonObjectAttributes ::= SEQUENCE { label Label OPTIONAL, flags CommonObjectFlags OPTIONAL, authId Identifier OPTIONAL, userConsent INTEGER(1..cia-ub-userConsent) OPTIONAL, accessControlRules SEQUENCE SIZE(1..MAX) OF AccessControlRule OPTIONAL, ... } (CONSTRAINED BY {-- authId should be present if flags.private is set. -- It shall equal an authID in one authentication object in the AOD -- })

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CommonObjectAttributes.ToString
member.returns: converts the CIO to a readable string

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15DDO
member.summary:
Shall encode PKCS 15 DDO ASN1 object:
DDO ::= SEQUENCE { oid OBJECT IDENTIFIER, odfPath Path OPTIONAL, tokenInfoPath[0] Path OPTIONAL, unusedPath[1] Path OPTIONAL, ... -- For future extensions }

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15DDO.ToString
member.summary: Converts the DDO object to a readable string

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CommonAuthenticationObjectAttributes
M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CommonAuthenticationObjectAttributes.getFlagsAsString
member.summary: return the common authentication object attributes flags as friendly string

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CommonCertificateAttributes
member.summary: The class decodes the following ASN.1 syntax: CommonCertificateAttributes ::= SEQUENCE { iD Identifier, authority BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, identifier CredentialIdentifier {{ KeyIdentifiers} OPTIONAL, certHash[0] CertHash OPTIONAL, trustedUsage[1] Usage OPTIONAL, identifiers[2] SEQUENCE OF CredentialIdentifier {{ KeyIdentifiers} } OPTIONAL, validity[4] Validity OPTIONAL, ... } -- Context tag[3] is reserved for historical reasons NOTE PKCS #15 uses context tag [3]. Usage::= SEQUENCE { keyUsage KeyUsage OPTIONAL, extKeyUsage SEQUENCE SIZE(1..MAX) OF OBJECT IDENTIFIER OPTIONAL, ... } (WITH COMPONENTS {..., keyUsage PRESENT } | WITH COMPONENTS {..., extKeyUsage PRESENT })

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15CommonCertificateAttributes.#ctor(smartcardLib.Core.ASN1)
member.param: ASN1 object that contains the CommonCertificateAttributes

member.summary: CommonKeyAttributes ::= SEQUENCE { iD Identifier, usage KeyUsageFlags, native BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, accessFlags KeyAccessFlags OPTIONAL, keyReference Reference OPTIONAL, startDate GeneralizedTime OPTIONAL, endDate[0] GeneralizedTime OPTIONAL, ... -- For future extensions }

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15PasswordAuthenticationObject
member.summary: This class supports password authentication objects. The class decodes the following ASN.1 syntax: PasswordAttributes::= SEQUENCE { pwdFlags PasswordFlags, pwdType PasswordType, minLength INTEGER(cia-lb-minPasswordLength..cia-ub-minPasswordLength), storedLength INTEGER(0..cia-ub-storedPasswordLength), maxLength INTEGER OPTIONAL, pwdReference[0] Reference DEFAULT 0, padChar OCTET STRING(SIZE(1)) OPTIONAL, lastPasswordChange GeneralizedTime OPTIONAL, path Path OPTIONAL, ...

member.name: T:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15Path

member.name: M:smartcardLib.PKCS15.PKCS15Path.getAbsolutePath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the absolute path without the MF file if there is an aid for the application it shall return aid# and then the path the path DF are separated by semicolons
member.param: If you have a df you want to pad to the path you should put it it here
member.returns: If the path is absolute it will return the full path otherwise it will return the padded path with the df input
